summary: After two months of separation, Emmanuelle must find her husband Jean in Hong Kong. She goes there by boat. Once in Thailand, she finds her husband and meets Christopher, a mysterious ... See full summary »
cast: Sylvia Kristel|Umberto Orsini|Frédéric Lagache|Catherine Rivet|Henri Czarniak|Tom Clark|Marion Womble|Florence Lafuma|Claire Richard|Laura Gemser|Jacqueline May Line|Eva Hamel|Christiane Gibeline|Jean-Pierre Nam|Marcel Lan Phuong|Ysabelle Lacamp|The Doan Gong Chanh Ballet|Caroline Laurence|Venantino Venantini|Sterling St. Jacques
title: Emmanuelle 2: La antivirgen
